question: Global payment tech leader VISA has partnered with which private bank to deploy VISA Secure for e-Commerce?
explanation:
Global leader in payments technology Visa has partnered with Federal Bank to deploy Visa Secure to the bankâ€™s cardholders.
Visa Secure is an authentication program that uses the latest standards of the EMV protocol. This upgraded technology will provide security to curb online frauds and quick check-out experience to the card-holders.
